SELECT * FROM (
SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNO, PrptyGroupName, PrptyGroupDesc FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM07
UPPER(PrptyGroupName) LIKE '%' || #searchPrptyGroupName# || '%'
) ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM07
UPPER(PrptyGroupName) LIKE '%' || #searchPrptyGroupName# || '%'
SELECT PrptyGroupName, PrptyGroupDesc FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM07 WHERE PrptyGroupName = #prptyGroupName#
SELECT PrptyName, Prpty2Val FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM08 WHERE PrptyGroupName = #prptyGroupName# ORDER BY 1
SELECT PRPTY2VAL FROM $schemaId$.tseairm08 WHERE PRPTYGROUPNAME =#prptyGroupName# AND PRPTYNAME=#prptyName#

MERGE INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIRM08 A USING ( SELECT 'Monitoring' AS PRPTYGROUPNAME, #prptyName# AS PRPTYNAME FROM DUAL ) B ON ( A.PRPTYGROUPNAME = B.PRPTYGROUPNAME AND A.PRPTYNAME = B.PRPTYNAME) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(PRPTYGROUPNAME, PRPTYNAME, PRPTY2VAL ) VALUES('Monitoring', #prptyName#, #prpty2Val#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET PRPTY2VAL = #prpty2Val#
